name: Logic Solutions
tagline: It's Time For A New Approach
description: Founded in 1995, Logic Solutions Inc. is a leader in web application, mobile, eCommerce, and software development. We help businesses transform through powerful technology. Our expertise includes: Mobile Applications, eCommerce Solutions Patient and Physician Portals Responsive Design Websites Supply Chain Applications, eLearning Applications, Logistics Tracking Solutions, Collaboration Portals, and much more!
